ric_cd.name: NCH Near Line Record Identification Code

values.O: Part B physician/supplier claim record (processed by local carriers; can include DMEPOS services)
values.V: Part A institutional claim record (inpatient (IP), skilled nursing facility (SNF), christian science (CS), home health agency (HHA), or hospice)
values.W: Part B institutional claim record (outpatient (OP), HHA)
values.U: Both Part A and B institutional home health agency (HHA) claim records -- due to HHPPS and HHA A/B split.
values.M: Part B DMEPOS claim record (processed by DME Regional Carrier)

values.71: RIC O local carrier non-DMEPOS claim
values.72: RIC O local carrier DMEPOS claim

values.7: Clinic or hospital-based renal dialysis facility

values.3: Interim - continuing claim (not valid for PPS claims)
values.4: Interim - last claim (not valid for PPS claims)
values.7: Replacement of prior claim provider debit
values.9: Final claim -- used in an HH PPS episode to indicate the claim should be processed like debit/credit adjustment to RAP (initial claim)
values.A: Admission election notice - used when hospice or Religious Nonmedical Health Care Institution is submitting the HCFA-1450 as an admission notice - hospice NOE only
values.B: Hospice/Medicare Coordinated Care Demonstration/RNCHI - Termination/Revocation Notice - hospice NOE only
values.C: Hospice change of provider notice - hospice NOE only
values.D: Hospice/Medicare Coordinated Care Demonstration/RNHCI - void/cancel - hospice NOE only
values.E: Hospice change of ownership - hospice NOE only
values.I: Misc adjustment claim (other than PRO or provider) - used to identify a debit adjustment initiated by CMS or an intermediary (other than QIO or Provider) - eff 10/93, used to identify intermediary initiated adjustment only
values.P: Adjustment required by Quality Improvement Organization (QIO) -- formerly Peer Review Organization (PRO)
values.X: Special adjustment processing - used for QA editing
values.Z: Hospital Encounter Data alternate submission (TOB '11Z') used for MCO enrollee hospital discharges 7/1/97-12/31/98; not stored in NCH. Exception: Problem in startup months may have resulted in this abbreviated UB-92 being erroneously stored in NCH.

values.00011: Alabama BC - Iowa (replaced by MAC # 03401 -- see below)
values.00030: Arizona BC (replaced by MAC #03101 -- see below)
values.00250: Montana BC (replaced by MAC #03201 -- see below)
values.00320: North Dakota BC - North Dakota (replaced with MAC # 03301 -- see below)
values.00323: North Dakota BC - Idaho, Oregon & Utah (replaced with MAC # 03501 --see below)
values.00460: Wyoming BC (replaced by MAC # 03601 -- see below)
values.50333: Travelers; Connecticut United Healthcare (terminated - date unknown)
values.80883: Contractor ID for Inpatient & Outpatient Risk Adjustment Data (data not sent through CWF; but through Palmetto)

nopay_cd.name: Claim Medicare Non Payment Reason Code

values.C: Custodial care - noncovered care (includes all 'beneficiary at fault'waiver cases) (Obsolete)
values.E: MSP cost avoided - IRS/SSA/HCFA Data Match
values.F: MSP cost avoid HMO Rate Cell
values.H: MSP cost avoided Employer Voluntary Reporting
values.J: MSP cost avoid Insurer Voluntary Reporting
values.K: MSP cost avoid Initial Enrollment Questionnaire
values.R: Benefits refused, or evidence not submitted
values.U: MSP cost avoided - HMO rate cell adjustment
values.Y: MSP cost avoided - IRS/SSA data match project (obsolete 6/30/00)
values.Z: Zero reimbursement RAPs -- zero reimbursement made due to medical review intervention or where provider specific zero payment has been determined. (effective with HHPPS - 10/00)
values.12: MSP cost avoided - BCBS Voluntary Agreements
values.13: MSP cost avoided - Office of Personnel Management
values.14: MSP cost avoided - Workman's Compensation (WC) Datamatch
values.15: MSP cost avoided - Workman's Compensation Insurer Voluntary Data Sharing Agreements (WC VDSA)
values.16: MSP cost avoided - Liability Insurer VDSA
values.17: MSP cost avoided - No-Fault Insurer VDSA
values.18: MSP cost avoided - Pharmacy Benefit Manager Data Sharing Agreement
values.19: SEE NOTE4: Coordination of Benefits Contractor 11119 (see CMS Change Request 7906 for identification of the contractor.)
values.21: MSP cost avoided - MIR Group Heqalth Plan
values.22: MSP cost avoided - MIR non-Group Health Plan
values.25: MSP cost avoided - Recovery Audit Contractor - California
values.26: MSP cost avoided - Recovery Audit Contractor - Florida
values.42: SEE NOTE4: Coordination of Benefits Contractor 11142 (see CMS Change Request 7906 for identification of the contractor.)
values.43: SEE NOTE4: Coordination of Benefits Contractor 11143 (see CMS Change Request 7906 for identification of the contractor.)
values.@: MSP cost avoided - BC/BS Voluntary Agreements
values.#: MSP cost avoided - Office of Personnel Management
values.$: MSP cost avoided - Workman's Compensation (WC) Datamatch
values.*: MSP cost avoided - Workman's Compensation Insurer Voluntary Data Sharing Agreements (WC VDSA)
values.(: MSP cost avoided - Liability Insurer VDSA
values.): MSP cost avoided - No-Fault Insurer VDSA
values.+: MSP cost avoided - Pharmacy Benefit Manager Data Sharing Agreement
values.<: MSP cost avoided - MIR Group Health Plan
values.>: MSP cost avoided - MIR non-Group Health Plan
values.%: MSP cost avoided - Recovery Audit Contractor - California
values.&: MSP cost avoided - Recovery Audit Contractor - Florida

values.A: Working aged bene/spouse with employer group health plan (EGHP)
values.B: End stage renal disease (ESRD) beneficiary in the 18 month coordination period with an employer group health plan
values.C: Conditional payment by Medicare; future reimbursement expected
values.F: Public Health Service or other federal agency (other than Dept. of Veterans Affairs)
values.G: Working disabled bene (under age 65 with LGHP)
values.Y: Other secondary payer investigation shows Medicare as primary payer

values.66: Commonwealth of the Northern Marianas Islands
values.99: With 000 county code is American Samoa; otherwise unknown

values.51: Medical supply company with certified orthotist (certified by American Board for Certification in Prosthetics And Orthotics)
values.52: Medical supply company with certified prosthetist (certified by American Board for Certification In Prosthetics And Orthotics)
values.53: Medical supply company with certified prosthetist-orthotist (certified by American Board for Certification in Prosthetics and Orthotics)
values.54: Medical supply company not included in 51, 52, or 53.  (Revised 10/93 to mean medical supply company for DMERC)
values.59: Ambulance service supplier, e.g., private ambulance companies, funeral homes, etc.
values.60: Public health or welfare agencies (federal, state, and local)
values.61: Voluntary health or charitable agencies (e.g. National Cancer Society, National Heart Association, Catholic Charities)
values.65: Physical therapist (private practice added 4/1/03) (independently practicing removed 4/1/03)
values.67: Occupational therapist (private practice added 4/1/03) (independently practicing removed 4/1/03)
values.74: Radiation Therapy Centers (added to differentiate them from Independent Diagnostic Testing Facilities
values.75: Slide Preparation Facilities (added to differentiate them from Independent Diagnostic Testing Facilites
values.87: All other suppliers (e.g. drug and department stores) (note: DMERC used 87 to mean department store from 10/93 through 9/94; recoded eff 10/94 to A7; NCH cross-walked DMERC reported 87 to A7.
values.88: Unknown supplier/provider specialty (note: DMERC used 87 to mean grocery store from 10/93 - 9/94; recoded eff 10/94 to A8; NCH cross-walked DMERC reported 88 to A8.
values.A6: Medical supply company with respiratory therapist
values.A7: Department store (for DMERC use: eff 10/94, but cross-walked from code 87 eff 10/93)
values.A8: Grocery store (for DMERC use: eff 10/94, but cross-walked from code 88 eff 10/93)
values.A9: Indian Health Service (IHS), tribe and tribal organizations (non-hospital or non-hospital based facilities.  DMERCs shall process claims submitted by IHS, tribe and non-tribal organizations for DMEPOS and drugs covered by the DMERCs.
values.B1: Supplier of oxygen and/or oxygen related equipment
values.B3: Medical Supply Company with Pedorthic Personnel

values.1: MCO has paid the provider for a claim
values.0: MCO has not paid the provider for a claim
values: MCO has not paid the provider for a claim

actioncd.name: FI or MAC Claim Action Code

values.1: Original debit action (includes non-adjustment RTI correction items) - it will always be a 1 in regular bills.
values.8: Benefits refused (for inpatient bills, an  nonpayment code must also be present

clm_op_esrd_mthd_cd.name: Claim Outpatient End Stage Renal Disease (ESRD) Method of Reimbursement Code

values.1: Method 1 - Home supplies purchased through a facility
values.2: Method 2 - Home supplies purchased from a supplier
